channel.title: Ip Banning
channel.description:
Would anyone here happen to have a command for ip banning? I would like to have it in my server >.< My ip banning isn't working.
Also if you can i need: "mute" - mutes a player "disabletrade" - disables trade/duel/drop "enabletrade" - enables trade/duel/drop
-Thanks-

hey. ip banin can rearly be put into a command. oyu have to go into there charecter file. copy there ip. and put in server.java where ti says if connectionstartswith

item.title: Ip Banning

item.description:
@Vladie wrote:

Would anyone here happen to have a command for ip banning? I would like to have it in my server >.< My ip banning isn’t working.

Also if you can i need:
“mute” - mutes a player
“disabletrade” - disables trade/duel/drop
“enabletrade” - enables trade/duel/drop

-Thanks-
